channel.title: Looking for a server team!
channel.description:
[center]Hey im Will im looking for a coding team for my latest addition for 'Epsonation'
my last server had been building up tonnes of lag and crashing my server. so i decided to use a completly new source and start over, ive lready done alot to it but looking for some more help so that i can bring a completly awsome server together.
Alot of upgrades so far: Full range with projectiles, also fully working crystal bow and animations. Full working mage on npc's (not yet fixed on npc's) Working on full pickpocketing at the moment. starts in west ardy. full hits like real runescape. Monsters/npc's attack you back with the right animations! some good training spots! (adding more tele commands to make easier. some good shops, (adding new silabs to some of them)
The aim for my right now is to make a custom server but along with the feel of moparscape. so it wont be as hard as runescape but will have most things like it for example, npc's blocks and attack animations. full range mage and melee etc.
anyways im going to need the following people to fill these spots. the coders that are joining me will have their unique name on my server for example "mod (name)" etc. congratulations on the following people.
Coder #1: Coder #2: Code compiler (puts codes together): Assistant owner: Java_Coffee™
Add my msn if you want to join, this will be my msn for all server discussions etc. individual-fear@hotmail.com[/center]

item.title: Looking for a server team!
item.dc:creator: @william1 william1
item.description:
@william1 wrote:

thanks for some support guys, but really, i code quite a bit, ill admit im not going to be top notch but i can do the odd bits and pieces, anyway i just wanted to get a team together to make one kick ass server ftw

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a server team!
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

rustyxcod:

sorry to say but the junior member kinda says your new, and your trying to get people to do the work for you. If I’m wrong don’t yell, just a thought. But its good if your trying to actually get a team together. If i was good enough id think about it, lol. But I’m uh… “learning”

Posts don’t mean anything. All your posts could be random spam. Don’t judge em on that.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a server team!
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

I have a code compiler you can have. If you want I can edit it to have your name on. You can DL it in the link on my Signature.

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a server team!
item.dc:creator: @buzzman1992 buzzman1992
item.description:
@buzzman1992 wrote:

What kind of server?
Whats your bit-rate?(So you can create a ‘full’ or ‘small’ server…)
What kind of base server?

Read full topic

[center]Hey im Will
im looking for a coding team for my latest addition for ‘Epsonation’

my last server had been building up tonnes of lag and crashing my server. so i decided to use a completly new source and start over, ive lready done alot to it but looking for some more help so that i can bring a completly awsome server together.
